thread.title: WH Considers Mobilizing Up To 100,000 Troops To Round Up Unauthorized Immigrants
thread.title_full: WH Considers Mobilizing Up To 100,000 Troops To Round Up Unauthorized Immigrants

author: ASSOCIATED PRESS
title: WH Considers Mobilizing Up To 100,000 Troops To Round Up Unauthorized Immigrants
text:
A draft memo obtained by The Associated Press outlines a Trump administration proposal under consideration to mobilize as many as 100,000 National Guard troops to round up unauthorized immigrants. Millions of those who would be affected in 11 states live nowhere near the Mexico border.

Read More â†’
